 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package messaging

Class Summary
AbstractMessage  
CarArrivalMessage Specifies information about a Car arrival.
DoneMessage A SimpleMessage which specifies that the simulation is done
GateDoneMessage Message to announce the fact that a gate is done with its responsibilities, whatever those may be
GateMessage A GateMessage specifies the location of a Gate in the system.
GateSubscribeMessage A GateSubscribeMessage is a message which is used to announce to the Traffic Generator that a given actor would like to receive cars The message contains information about the receiver's ip and port
ManagerAvailableMessage ManagerAvailableMessages specficy that a given manager has come online and is able to receive a paired gate
SimpleMessage SimpleMessages are messages which simply announce a change in state, they carry no payload
TimeMessage A TimeMessage announces a new canonical time in the system.
TimeSubscribeMessage A TimeSubscribeMessage is sent to tell the Traffic Generator that a given actor would like to receive time updates
TokenMessage A TokenMessage is used to send tokens to a actor within the system
TokenRequestMessage A TokenRequestMessage is a message sent between gates requesting tokens from their respective dates.
TokenRequireMessage The TokenRequireMessage is used by Gates to communicate that they need tokens
TokenResponseMessage The TokenResponseMessage is a response to a token request and used to send tokens between managers
